changeTag.title: Manage Change NameTAG
changeTag.note: Note: Once you change your NameTAG, any payments made for the previous NameTAG will not be carried forward. We recommend changing your NameTAG at the end of your current plan.
changeTag.emptyState: No active NameTAG services found to unsubscribe.

unsubscribe.title: Manage NameTAG Unsubscription
